Welcome to the Escape Room editor! Lets go over the basics:


Walls - To build some walls all you have to do is to make a long click wherever you want the next wall to end.
 If you want to connect two points that already exist, click in one of them and then two times on the other one (slowly). 


Wall Colors - To determine which walls will need to be unlocked you have to make them RED, for that click one time in the desired wall and voilá.
But all escape rooms need to have a way out, so to specify the finishing wall you click two times in a wall to make it BLUE. 


Delete Walls - If you want to delete a wall, activate the trash can button and click in the wall that you want to delete. 


Start Position - This button's purpose is to specify where you want the players to begin to play. For that you activate this button and make a long click on the map wherever you want them to start. 


Quizzes - Here is the place where you can add a new quiz or edit/delete existing ones. These quizzes will be shown to the players when trying to unlock the red walls. 


Save - Don't forget to save your escape room with a cool name :D
